long_description: The lightest and smallest water purifier from SteriPEN, the Freedom features an integrated rechargeable battery so you don't have to hassle with swapping batteries before a big adventure. Compact purifier itself weighs only 2.6 oz. and measures 5.1 x 1.25 x 0.8 in.; carried with the included USB cable, AC adapter and neoprene case, the total weight is 6.4 oz. Simple to use, the SteriPEN Freedom detects when the device is in water and automatically activates the UV lamp to begin purifying-no buttons to press! Freedom is configured to treat 0.5 liter of water in 48 sec.; a green indicator light lets you know when the treatment is complete and the water is safe to drink. To purify 1 liter of water, simply treat the water twice. Integrated rechargeable battery is recharged by plugging the device into a computer, AC outlet or solar charger (sold separately) with the included USB cable. Includes an LED flashlight that's handy when the sun goes down; activate the flashlight by holding the Freedom horizontal and rotating your wrist 180deg 3 times. Freedom requires no pumping, chemicals, test strips, extended timekeeping or filters; leaves no aftertaste, will not clog and does not require lubrication. SteriPEN system uses UV light rays instead of chemicals to purify water for drinking. Ultraviolet (UV-C) light rays safely sterilize clear water by destroying 99.99% of protozoa (including Giardia and. Long used by municipal water districts and bottling companies, low-level UV-C light treats water safely; unit's light will not damage eyes or skin when used properly. SteriPEN protects you from risks that cause botulism, cholera, dysentery and typhoid, just to name a few. Small size fits most containers-use it in cups, mugs, water bottles and canteens; carries easily in a shirt pocket.
